column2:
Access code
Printed on the letter you received.

I consent to be contacted to continue the survey.
If I do not complete it or if some of the information provided is incoherent.

Positioning your home
Search for your home using its postal code or address by clicking the button below, or please position the location on the map by navigating, zooming, and clicking. Once the location is located, you can move the point for greater precision.

Persons living in your home
Including yourself and children in shared custody if they were at your home on {{assignedDate}}.

Cars, SUVs, light-duty trucks or vans, etc.
Available to one or more members of your household.

Bicycles, electric bicycles (e-bikes), or electric scooters owned by household members
Include only usable bicycles in good condition.
Among these bicycles, how many are electric bicycles (e-bikes)?

Is there at least one person in your household having a permanent disability that limits their daily travel?
Including yourself

yes : Yes
no : No
preferNotToAnswer : I prefer not to answer

Age
For babies under the age of 1, write "0"

Name or nickname that will allow you to identify this person for the remainder of the interview
Can be a nickname, initials, or who this person represents to you (ex: 'Me','Kiddo','Mum','JT').
The name is only used to simplify the response process and will be removed from the final dataset.
Permanent physical, intellectual or other disability which influences or limits their daily mobility?

yes : Yes
no : No
preferNotToAnswer : I prefer not to answer

Sex at birth
Sex assigned at birth or that which appears on legal documents.

female : Female
male : Male
preferNotToAnswer : I prefer not to answer
I prefer to give the gender

female : Woman
male : Man
custom : This person identifies  as:
preferNotToAnswer : I prefer not to answer

fullTime : Yes, full time (30h and more/week)
partTime : Yes, part time (less than 30h/week)
no : No

fullTime : Yes, full time
partTime : Yes, part time
no : No

kindergarten (ifAge5OrLessConditional : age <= 5) : Kindergarten/Childcare/CPE
primarySchool (ifAge4to13Conditional : age >= 4 && age <= 13) : Primary school
secondarySchool (ifAge11OrMoreConditional : age >= 11) : Secondary school
schoolAtHome (ifAge4to15Conditional : age >= 4 && age <= 15) : School at home
atHome (ifAge5OrLessConditional : age <= 5) : At home
collegeCegepDepAep (ifAge15OrMoreConditional : age >= 15) : CEGEP / College / DEP / AEP
other : Other (specify)

fullTimeWorker : Employed full-time (30h and more/week)
partTimeWorker : Employed part-time (less than 30h/week)
workerAndStudent : Work and studies
fullTimeStudent : Full-time student
partTimeStudent : Part-time student
retired (ifAge40OrMoreConditional : age >= 40) : Retired
atHome : At home
unemployed : Unemployed / searching for a job
parentalOrSickLeave : Sick leave or parental leave
longTermDisability : Long-term disability
volunteer : Volunteer
other : Other
preferNotToAnswer : Prefer not to answer
Before being on leave, did {{nickname}} work?

fullTime : Yes, full time (30h and more/week)
partTime : Yes, part time (less than 30h/week)
no : No

Highest level of educational attainment
When in doubt, choose the level which seems to match best

noneOrPrimaryEducation : No certificate, diploma or degree
secondaryEducation : High school (secondary) diploma or equivalency certificate
postSecondaryNonTertiaryEducation : Apprenticeship or trades certificate or diploma
shortCycleTertiaryEducation : College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma
diplomaBelowBachelor : University certificate or diploma below bachelor level
bachelorOrHigher : Bachelor's degree or higher
preferNotToAnswer : I prefer not to answer

Driver's licence
Include learner's and probationary permits, but do not include moped (motorized scooter) permits.

yes : Yes
no : No
dontKnow : I don't know

Carsharing member
Subscription or pass to a carsharing service (ex. Communauto)

yes : Yes
no : No
dontKnow : I don't know
Does {{nickname}} currently have a valid transit pass or ticket?

no : No
transitPass : Monthly or annual pass
tickets : Individual tickets or rides
dontKnow : I don't know
isWorkerConditional : occupation === fullTimeWorker || occupation === partTimeWorker || occupation === workerAndStudent
Does {{nickname}} have a fixed work location?

onLocation : Yes, always on-site at fixed location
hybrid : Yes, hybrid work (remote and on-site)
onTheRoadWithUsualPlace : Yes, work on the road departing from a fixed location (ex: garage, office, station, restaurant, etc.)
onTheRoadWithoutUsualPlace : No, work on the road departing from home
remote : No, work from home or from elsewhere
Before being on leave, did {{nickname}} have a fixed work location?
isStudentConditional : occupation === fullTimeStudent || occupation === partTimeStudent || occupation === workerAndStudent
Does {{nickname}} have a fixed study location?

onLocation : Yes, always on-site at fixed location
hybrid : Yes, hybrid studies (remote and on-site)
remote : No, remote studies from home or from elsewhere

hasWorkingLocationConditional : workPlaceType === onLocation || workPlaceType === hybrid || workPlaceType === onTheRoadWithUsualPlace || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === onLocation || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === hybrid || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === onTheRoadWithUsualPlace
Name or address of {{nickname}}'s usual place of work

hasWorkingLocationConditional : workPlaceType === onLocation || workPlaceType === hybrid || workPlaceType === onTheRoadWithUsualPlace || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === onLocation || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === hybrid || workPlaceTypeBeforeLeave === onTheRoadWithUsualPlace
Name or address of {{nickname}}'s school or main study location

Please locate the usual place of study for {{nickname}}.
Navigate, zoom, and click on the map to identify the location. Once located, you can move the marker for greater precision.
You can also search for the place on the map using the "Search location" button.
isWorkerConditional : occupation === fullTimeWorker || occupation === partTimeWorker || occupation === workerAndStudent

During the last week, when did {{nickname}} travel for work?
To get to or for any other reason concerning work.
During the last week, when did {{nickname}} work remotely?
Who do you want to continue the interview for?

We will ask you to specify {{nickname}}’s trips.

The order of the interviewed persons was randomly selected.

Did {{nickname}} make any trips on {{assignedDate}}?
Include all trips, whether for personal reasons (shopping, outings, leisure, etc.), for work, or to pick up or drop someone off.
You already declared trip. Do you confirm they are erroneous and that {{nickname}} did not make any trips on {{formattedTripsDate}}?

Please specify the places {{nickname}} went on {{assignedDate}} (include all places visited until 4 AM the following morning) - Include short stops and errands (gas station, daycare/school, convenience store or any place where {{nickname}} picked someone up or dropped someone off). - Include all places regardless of the mode of transport used to get there (walking, cycling, car, public transit, taxi, plane, boat, etc.). - Do not include transfer locations (bus stops, train stations, terminals, parking lots, etc.) unless {{nickname}} went there to drop someone off or pick someone up.

Did {{nickname}} start their day at home ({{address}})?
Answer 'No' only if {{nickname}} did not sleep at home (nuit du {{dayOne}} au {{dayTwo}}) or came home after 4 AM (ex: overnight work shift).

otherParentHome (ifAge16OrLessConditional : age <= 16 && age !== null) : Home of the other parent or guardian
workedOvernight (isWorkerConditional : occupation === fullTimeWorker || occupation === partTimeWorker || occupation === workerAndStudent) : Worked overnight
secondaryHome : Secondary residence (cottage or other)
sleptAtFriends : Stayed at a friend’s, partner’s or family’s home
restaurant : Was at or was coming back from a restaurant or bar
hotelForWork (isWorkerConditional : occupation === fullTimeWorker || occupation === partTimeWorker || occupation === workerAndStudent) : Hotel or other venue for a conference / work
hotelForVacation : Hôtel or other on vacation
studying (isStudentConditional : occupation === fullTimeStudent || occupation === partTimeStudent || occupation === workerAndStudent) : School / place of study: studied or slept there
other : Other

Places {{nickname}} went on {{assignedDate}}:
Chronological order must be respected (i.e. sequence matters).
What was the departure place of {{nickname}}’s work trip on the road?
Where did {{nickname}} end {{gender:his/her/their/his (her)}} work trip on the road?

Did you previously locate this place on the map?
In {{nickname}}'s travel diary or that of another household member.
Please select this place from the list of previously located places:

Please locate this place on the map
Pan, zoom and click on map. Once a pin icon has been dropped, you will be able to drag the icon to specify a more precise location. You can also search for a place using its name or address with the button below.
At what time did {{nickname}} leave the previous location ({{visitedPlaceDescription}}) before going to {{gender:his/her/their/his (her)}} usual work place?

After being {{atPlace}}, {{nickname}}…
If {{nickname}} left this place after 4 AM the following day, please consider for the purposes of the survey that they stayed there until the next day and select the appropriate answer.
Please indicate all modes of transport used for this trip (from {{originName}} to {{destinationName}}), in chronological order:

How did {{nickname}} reach the transit stop?
If the mode used is not present, create a first mode before the transit mode.

yes : Yes
no : No
dontKnow : I don't know

Persons in the vehicle
Including the driver.

Bus line(s) taken (in chronological order)
For each line, begin by typing the number or name, then select it from the results shown.
Some bus line(s) seem invalid for this trip. Please validate the lines.
Please specify the address or the name of the location where the change in mode of transport occurred (terminal, transit stop, parking lot, etc.) or click directly on map

Please locate the junction point (location where the change in mode of transport occurred).
Navigate, zoom, and click on the map to identify the location. Once located, you can move the marker for greater precision.
You can also search for the place on the map using the name or address indicated above ("Find the place from the name" button).
You didn't report any work trips by {{nickname}} on {{assignedDate}}

yes : Yes
